Title: Mellow_'s Jakiro Done Right!: Ice Path for All

ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Extra armour helps with Jakiro's initial squishy-ness, and this builds nicely into a Ring of Basilius.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer:
Please don't neglect these. These are VERY important, and as Jakiro you __DON'T__ need items to be effective.

If you ward well, your team will love you.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry:
For counter-warding and anti-invisibility. Situational, but rather important.

I'd say you should get these every game, as most teams will ward. Counter-warding is __VERY__ effective.
ItemTooltips.courier: If this is picked up by someone else, get wards!
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Let's be honest here, this is really all you need after Arcane Boots.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Make sure to turn the aura off when you don't want your creeps to push lanes!
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
This isn't necessary, but can be fantastic if you need the extra AoE damage for Macropyre.

I will rarely build this unless I am pulling in mega bank.

The disable items are almost always better.
